/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -O3 -g    CMakeFiles/ceres_customBundle.dir/ceresBundle.cpp.o  -o ceres_customBundle -rdynamic libBALProblem.so libParseCmd.so /usr/local/lib/libceres.a -lglog -lgflags -lpthread -lspqr -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -lcholmod -lccolamd -lcamd -lcolamd -lamd -llapack -lf77blas -latlas -Wl,-Bstatic -lsuitesparseconfig -Wl,-Bdynamic -lrt /usr/local/lib/libmetis.so -lgomp -lpthread -lspqr -ltbb -ltbbmalloc -lcholmod -lccolamd -lcamd -lcolamd -lamd -llapack -lf77blas -latlas -Wl,-Bstatic -lsuitesparseconfig -Wl,-Bdynamic -lrt /usr/local/lib/libmetis.so -lgomp -Wl,-rpath,/home/sicong/slambook/ch10/ceres_custombundle/cmake-build-debug:/usr/local/lib
